entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Parent view is visually covering the child view #12040
  • Memory leaks EVERYWHERE #12039
  • Unhandled Win32 Exception when Calling Shell.GoToAsync(..) during a load of a page #12038
  • Button/ImageButton Released event does not fire after multi-touch unless finger is on the button #12037
  • CollectionView ItemsUpdatingScrollMode="KeepLastItemInView" not working when IsGrouped="True" #12036
  • XAML Binding errors not being reported on Output OR XAML Binding Failure #12035
  • ImageButton Released event does not fire unless cursor is on the button, or after a multi-touch #12033
  • The alpha check for using OverFullScreen on a transparent modal is currently incorrect #12031
  • Unable to install Microsoft.Maui.Sdk.Msi.x64 during workload install dotnet 7.0.100 sdk #12030
  • [Android]Scrollbars Visibility property "Never" is not working properly in the ScrollView control #12028
  • [mac][iOS] content clip issue. #12022

Closed

  • [Webview] height 0 when we inspect with google chrome #4667
    .NET 7 Planning
  • WebView HTML5 Games not loading #8241
    Backlog
  • MauiImage resource as stream missing #12015
  • ScrollView doesn't resize when child scaled #11850
  • Assembly load error in Android app referencing another project referencing a DLL assembly #10154
  • error MSB4019: The imported project "C:\Program Files\dotnet\packs\Microsoft.iOS.Sdk\16.0.1478\tools\msbuild\iOS\Xamarin.iOS.VB.targets" was not found. #11997
  • ContentPage - IsBusy="True" throw Exception on Android #12025
  • SwipeItemView does not work #10065
    Backlog
  • NullReferenceException from ShellToolbar OnBackButtonCanExecuteChanged #11401
    Backlog
  • BackbuttonBehavior with custom command throws 'Object reference not set to an instance of an object' exception. #10514
    Backlog
  • Searchhandler causes App crash when Text changes on iOS #10547
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Use a faster search when checking for item in SortedList #12041
  • [Build] Mega pipeline #12034
    do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix gestures in Label Spans #12027
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures

Merged

  • [Tizen] Add requesting re-layout step #11986
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨, platform/tizen
  • Update Essentials Launcher API Docs #11932
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Merge main to net8 #12032
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Update Development.md #12005
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Android] Fix SwipeItemView size issues #10522
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Vibrate - Detect zero duration and return early #11314
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #11949
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix crash using BackButtonBehavior and navigating to root #11438
    t/bug, area/navigation 🧭, area/shell 🐢
  • [iOS] Fix crash typing in Shell SearchHandler #11927
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, version/ios-16
  • Bump Xamarin.Firebase.AppIndexing from 120.0.0.9 to 120.0.0.10 #11929
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Updated

  • Add basic Android automated accessiblity testing #11097
    area/testing
  • [Tizen] Add missing Shell features in Tizen #11597
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • Remove gesture from page that interferes with accessibility #10948
    area/a11y, area/gestures
  • [iOS] Fix Entry Next Keyboard Button Finds Next TextField #11914
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Make MAUI into 1 workload and lots of NuGets instead of a full workload #11206
    area/setup 🪄
  • CollectionView - Recycle DataTemplates when using template selector #12011
    area/collectionview 📃
  • [Android] Fix clipped text in SwipeItem under some DPIs #11931
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Tests embed screenshot #11952
    area/testing
  • [net7.0] Ensure that UIScrollView ContentSize is set #11791
    area/layout 🔲
  • Added StartPath to get/set initial BlazorWebView URL #11942
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [net7.0] [iOS] Allow transparent modal pages #11795
  • Enable parallel builds back #10420
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Make inline video / picture in picture enabled by default on WebView for iOS #11075
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Update Essentials MagnetoMeter API Docs #11933
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Essentials Map API Docs #11936
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Essentials HapticFeedback API Docs #11930
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Essentials Geolocation API Docs #11924
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Essentials Compass API Docs #11414
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
  • [macOS] Fix crash using Shell SearchHandler on Catalyst #11926
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/shell 🐢
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
